name: Eliza
desc: Eliza makes your battery colour represent how full it is.

screenshots.name: battery.png
screenshots.accessibilityText: An image of the battery at different levels.

changelog.changes:
- Better coloured battery icons. (Special thanks to @strafe on GitHub)
- Added Preferences!
  - Enable/Disable the tweak.
  - Option to use the original low power mode colour
  - Option to use the original charging colour
